LiveOnly.label: Only when live
LiveOnly.tooltip: Command is only active when stream is live

StartCommand.label: Start Command
StartCommand.tooltip: The command to start the break

EndCommand.label: End Command
EndCommand.tooltip: The command to end the break and vote

Permission.label: Permission level
Permission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the star/end commands

PermissionInfo.label: Permission level info
PermissionInfo.tooltip: Set the user, rank or tier for permission

PayoutCreator.label: Payout to creator of winning clip
PayoutCreator.tooltip: How many points to give to the creator of the winning clip

PayoutVoter.label: Payout to random voter
PayoutVoter.tooltip: How many points to give to a random voter who liked the winning clip

Channel.label: Channel Name
Channel.tooltip: Channel Name for clips. Keep empty for Stream Channel

Period.label: Period
Period.tooltip: Period during which clips were made

Limit.label: Number of retrieved clips
Limit.tooltip:
How many clips to retrieve from which clips will be randomly selected. 
 Keep lower than how many clips are usually created within the period specified.

NClips.label: Number of displayed clips
NClips.tooltip: Number of clips to be shown.

Browser.label: Browser
Browser.tooltip: The browser you want to use for clips. Pick one you do not use.

height.label: Height of clip
height.tooltip: Set height of clip on browser

width.label: Width of clip
width.tooltip: Set width of clip on browser

NextClip.label: Seconds before moving to next clip
NextClip.tooltip: Add a few seconds to account for the time it takes the browser/clip to load

StartAnnounce.value: Send {0} followed by the number to give a like to the clip you like
StartAnnounce.label: Start Message
StartAnnounce.tooltip:
Message to announce starting the vote 
 {0} = vote command

FinalWarning.value: You have around {0} seconds left to like the clips
FinalWarning.label: Ending Warning
FinalWarning.tooltip:
Message to announce voting will end soon. 
 {0} = delay

Delay.label: Delay (seconds)
Delay.tooltip: Delay to end voting after end command.

VoteResponse.label: Vote response
VoteResponse.tooltip:
Message sent when user likes a clip 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = Clip number

Response.value: The winning clip was Clip {0} with {1} like(s). The clip is called {8}, and was created by: {2} on {9} (You can rewatch it on: {7}). {2} has received {3} {4} for creating the clips. And {5} has received {6} {4} for liking it!
Response.label: Winning message
Response.tooltip:
{0} = Winning Clip number 
 {1} = number of likes 
 {2} = Creator 
 {3} = Payout to creator 
 {4} = currency name 
 {5} = random voter 
 {6} = Payout to random voter 
 {7} = URL to clip 
 {8} = Title of clip 
 {9} = Time/Date of clip

NotInChat.value: {0} did not receive their winnings because they are not in chat!
NotInChat.label: Not in chat message
NotInChat.tooltip:
Clip creators can only receive points if they are in chat. Message if not in chat 
 {0} = creator
